name: exec
brief: Executes shell command and returns console output as result
description: Executes shell command and returns console output as result.
author: little-brother

name: fileio
brief: Reads and writes files on a disk
description: Functions to read files and write to files on disk.
author: D. Richard Hipp

name: fuzzy
description: Measure distance between two strings, compute phonetic string code and transliterate a string
author: Anton Zhiyanov (nalgeon), Ross Bayer, D. Richard Hipp

name: icu
description: Add partial support for national symbols by redefinition lower and upper functions.

name: inja
description: Mustache jinia-like template parser. sqlite-gui uses it non-directly for scripting. Check Wiki for details.
author: little-brother

name: odbc
brief: Access to data through ODBC interface
description: The extension provides a way to work with any databases through ODBC interface.
author: little-brother

name: regexp
description: The extension implements regexp function and operator.
author: D. Richard Hipp

name: series
brief: Simple sequence generator as a table
description: One table-valued-function, that returns sequence of values.
author: D. Richard Hipp

name: text
description: Set of string functions, from slice, contains and count to split_part, trim and repeat.
author: Anton Zhiyanov (nalgeon)

name: vsv
description: Provides access to CSV as virtual tables.
author: Keith Medcalf

name: xlite
brief: Excel and ODS files as virtual tables
description: Provides access to Excel(.xlsx, .xls) and ODS (.ods) spreadsheets as virtual tables.
author: Sergey Khabibullin (x2bool)

name: xml
description: Functions for managing XML content stored in an SQLite database as text. XPath 1.0 is used to obtain a data.
author: little-brother
